rows.description:
Predicted risk-level (ranges from 1 to 8, based on "bins" for number of fatalities) for the 3 month period being forecast.

‘0-0.03’

rows.title: Fatalities:
rows.description: Predicted number of fatalities (rounded to whole numbers) for the 3 month period being forecast.

rows.title: Predictions Increasing:
rows.description: True if predictions have increased for two consecutive months (note: some % change values be slightly positive, but show as 0 due to rounding).

rows.title: % change [Jan] to [Feb]:
rows.description: Percentage change of the predictions from the previous month to the current month.

rows.title: % change [Dec] to [Jan]:
rows.description: Percentage change of the predictions from 2 months ago to the previous month.

rows.title: Past 2-year Average:
rows.description: Average value predicted during the previous 2 years.

rows.title: > 2-year Average:
rows.description: True if the current month's prediction is higher than the average for the previous 2 years. False otherwise.
